page.title: 16TOURISM AROUND IGHTHAM
page.content: Seal St.Lawrence is a small parish bordering Ightham and includes Seal Chart. The earliest historical record mentioning Seal Chart now lies in The British Museum. It is a Royal Charter dated 822, containing a reference to "Cymesingas Cert" - i.e. Kemsing Chart. St Lawrence has little to offer in the way of "Romantic" history. It possess no ancient church, no old fortifications or mediaeval dwelling house nd it has not offered a home for one of the Kentish families which have become famous in England's history. There is an ancient road. It is called The Old Roman Road from Maidstone to Sevenoaks. Some interesting places in the area are Chart Farm and Stonepits Manor.
